subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Softball
lead_paragraph: Mike Candrea, the University of Arizona softball coach whose bid to lead the United States to a gold medal ended with a loss to Japan in the title game at the Beijing Olympics, stepped down Wednesday as the coach of the national team. Candrea had guided the Americans since 2002 and went 17-1 in Olympic play. The only defeat was a 3-1 loss to Japan in the gold medal game last week.
